job.title: Software Engineer II, Partner Commerce - HBO Max
job.description: strongPeopleSoft Requisition NumberbrstrongR000040771brbrstrong Company Overview brbrstrongWarnerMedia is a leading media and entertainment company that creates and distributes premium and popular content from a diverse array of talented storytellers and journalists to global audiences through its consumer brands including HBO HBO Max Warner Bros TNT TBS truTV CNN DC Entertainment New Line Cartoon Network Adult Swim Turner Classic Movies and othersHBO is one of the most respected and innovative entertainment brands in the world serving iconic awardwinning programming to 140 million subscribers globally A subsidiary of WarnerMedia HBO is the worlds most successful pay TV service with an extensive array of programming that includes some of the most notable titles to be on television including drama series Succession   Watchmen   Westworld   Big Little Lies   Game of Thrones   The Sopranos   Band of Brothers  and The Wire   as well as comedy series Barry   Insecure  and Sex and the City   HBO is committed to retaining and recruiting skilled and motivated employees placing a priority on qualified team players who contribute to the diversity of their workforce HBO offers competitive benefits to include medical dental vision a matched 401k plan flexible spending a commuter benefit program and tuition reimbursementbrbrstrong The Job brstrongLike to develop features that connect and impact millions of customers The Partner Commerce team works closely with app stores and other partners to create the best customer experiences for purchasing and managing HBO Max subscriptions We are dedicated to continuous improvement and are looking for talented engineers to join the team to optimize the journey from awareness to streaming Were looking for Engineers that have an interest in the space and a passion for creating great softwarebrbrAs a Software Engineer II on WarnerMedias Partner Commerce team you will design improve and protect largescale systems for managing customer subscriptions You will build industryleading features across multiple device platforms You will own and improve features like in app purchases user messaging and gift cards By working on our team you will make some of the worlds best content accessible to millions of customers safely and seamlessly In this role you will join a growing team with many opportunities for you to expand your scope and influence You will use data and your experience to make smart engineering decisions and own critical areas of a product used by millions of customers You will get the opportunity to work in multiple areas of the product both on the clientside and serversidebrbrstrong The Daily brbrstrongulli Join a growing team with many opportunities for you to expand your skillset lili Grow your ability to design implement and own critical features of a product used by millions of customers lili Design improve and protect largescale systems for managing customer subscriptions for HBO Max lili Evaluate multiple technical approaches and drive consensus with peers lili Use data to solve real world problems and improve customer experience lili Collaborate and partner with engineers of all levels lili Work with designers product managers and marketers to optimize the purchase experience lili Handle operational issues and troubleshoot bugs independently brliul strong The Essentials brbrstrongulli 3 years of experience in software engineering building scalable services components for shipped consumer products or platforms lili Be passionate about software engineering with a strong sense of ownership for the code that you and your team write lili Strong understanding of Computer Science fundamentals including algorithms data structures and operating systems lili Fluency in a modern programming language ideally Java Swift JavaScript or TypeScript lili Be a quick learner that can leverage surrounding resources to solve problems lili Seek selfimprovement and adapt to suggestions and feedback lili Hold yourself and your team to high standards while maintaining respectful relationships lili Be passionate about software engineering with a strong sense of ownership for the code that you and your team write lili Ability to provide periodic oncall support for critical emergent customerfacing issues lili Experience creating automated tests as part of the development lifecycle Passion for test driven development lili A passion for learning sharing knowledge mentoring and working in a team setting with engineers of varying levels of experience lili Passion for collaboration and fun is a must brliul strong Nice to Haves brbrstrongulli Bachelors degree in an engineering or sciencerelated discipline lili Success in designing and building highly available applicationsystems at scale  and particularly in languages such as NodeJS Python GoLang or Java lili Success in designing and building exciting highly polished and dynamic user experiences lili Solid understanding of how the internet works and operates particularly in clientserver transactions with a keen knowledge of HTTP DNS REST etc lili DevOps experience where youve owned and operated the systems youve developed lili Experience in monitoring and telemetry Telegraf Grafana InfluxDB and Prometheus lili Experience creating web mobile game console settop box andor TV client application development lili Experience with a variety of backend persistence queuing and networking technologies especially Kubernetes and AWS lili Experience with security software engineering especially for distributed applications lili Experience with JavaScript TypeScript Swift andor Java lili Experience with Git version control brbrbrliulstrong The Perks brbrstrongli Exclusive WarnerMedia events and advance screeningslili Paid time off every year to volunteer for eligible employeeslili Access to wellbeing tools resources and freebieslili Access to inhouse learning and development resourceslili Part of the WarnerMedia family of powerhouse brandsbrbrliWarner Media LLC and its subsidiaries are equal opportunity employers Qualified candidates will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion national origin gender sexual orientation gender identity or expression age mental or physical disability and genetic information marital status citizenship status military status protected veteran status or any other category protected by law
